IMDb data; ttnr: 0382932, Title: Ratatouille, --- Description: Ratatouille: Directed by Brad Bird, Jan Pinkava. With Patton Oswalt, Ian Holm, Lou Romano, Brian Dennehy. A rat who can cook makes an unusual alliance with a young kitchen worker at a famous restaurant." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0382932/","name":"Ratatouille","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTMzODU0NTkxMF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMjQ4MzMzMw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"A rat who can cook makes an unusual alliance with a young kitchen worker at a famous restaurant.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0382932/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"willden21","dateCreated":"2007-06-17","inLanguage":"English","name":"An Amazing film, made for film lovers, with an artistic/indie appeal","reviewBody":"I caught a sneak peak yesterday, and must say, this film is a classic. It is not as flashy as cars, or as action packed as Incredibles, but it is a masterpiece of restraint and heart, that matches the classics from the golden age of the film industry. Pixar has always been groundbreaking for smart and fun animated features, but Ratatouille might just be what puts them over the top as one of the BEST all around film-making teams in history.

Ratatouille is a treat for film lovers. It feels like a classic. The animationis absolutely beautiful, especially the scenery of Paris which evoked awes from the audience, as if we were seeing a grandiose fireworks show.

The story is oh so classy and universal, especially when you look at it as a parable to yourself and society. Sometimes the story seems familiar, yet it is packed with so much genuine heart and individuality, that it might even be too "indie" for most audiences. But those who are patient and willing to open their minds and hearts, even when it may challenge the viewers to rethink their own personal biases, will find within this entertaining, sweet, simple film a remarkable message about challenging societal norms and not letting anything stand in your way of your dreams. When you follow your dreams, you never know what an impact it will have upon you, or those you might encounter on the journey. Just see the film, and be open to its message, and I am sure if you allow it too, it will touch you as well.

P.S. : The short in front of the feature is the funniest animated short film pixar has ever done, so even if ratatouille might not be as flashy as many might want it to be, the short film will have everyone in stitches, as it did our entire theater. So just go and see it, and be prepared for a wonderful two hours.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":10,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":671103,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":8,"contentRating":"G","genre":["Animation","Adventure","Comedy"],"datePublished":"2007-08-22","keywords":"rat,chef,ratatouille,cooking,paris france","trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Ratatouille","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi906147865","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNjU0YmUzZTQtZDU4ZS00NWYxLWJlNDMtOWE0ZWIzOGJmODM0XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNjU0YmUzZTQtZDU4ZS00NWYxLWJlNDMtOWE0ZWIzOGJmODM0XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"CT #2, Post","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0004951/","name":"Brad Garrett","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0738918/","name":"Lou Romano","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0652663/","name":"Patton Oswalt"],"director":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0083348/","name":"Brad Bird","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0684342/","name":"Jan Pinkava"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0008970/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0017902/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0083348/","name":"Brad Bird","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0684342/","name":"Jan Pinkava","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0135296/","name":"Jim Capobianco"],"duration":"PT1H51M"</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Die Goldfische
Szczygieł
The Goldfinch
programme.desc: Die Goldfische: Directed by Alireza Golafshan. With Tom Schilling, Klaas Heufer-Umlauf, Lisa Bitter, Sabrina Dietl. A good natured comedy about tax evasion and disability." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt7689310/","name":"Die Goldfische","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOTg2YTMyYjMtMTQ3Mi00OTU4LTlmMDEtYzQ2YjVjNWYxZDA1XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMDU5MDEyMA@@._V1_.jpg","description":"A good natured comedy about tax evasion and disability.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt7689310/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"kosmasp"},"dateCreated":"2021-05-12","inLanguage":"English","name":"Pricey fish","reviewBody":"Certain things may be hard for us as viewers to connect to. Not being a banker or someone who is detached from human interaction in general, it is not easy to fully identify with the main character here. And there are flaws or at least weird decisions along the way ... but it is a comedy and it tries to be as funny as it can be overall.\n\nThat out of the way, I had no idea what the movie would be like or any story element, so color me shocked and surprised by the inciting incident at the start of the movie. I did not see that coming/happening. After that "bang" the movie takes a minute to breathe a little bit and that is the moment you see the human in our main character. Overall we get quite a few of cliches though, but still it does its best to stay on the right side of funny and delicate when it touches certain subjects. Funny but predictable - still entertaining if you let it.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":1630,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.6},"genre":["Comedy"],"datePublished":"2019-03-21","keywords":"disability,wilhelm scream","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Die Goldfische","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3829447705","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNDZiZjViMDctZWE0Mi00NDdlLThjYzQtN2Q3YWQ0NjEyMmE0XkEyXkFqcGdeQTNwaW5nZXN0._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNDZiZjViMDctZWE0Mi00NDdlLThjYzQtN2Q3YWQ0NjEyMmE0XkEyXkFqcGdeQTNwaW5nZXN0._V1_.jpg","description":"Official Trailer"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0771713/","name":"Tom Schilling"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1678891/","name":"Klaas Heufer-Umlauf"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3474804/","name":"Lisa Bitter"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2285783/","name":"Alireza Golafshan"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0027692/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0239725/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0008261/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2285783/","name":"Alireza Golafshan"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1487045/","name":"Justyna Müsch"}],"duration":"PT1H51M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: The Handmaid's Tale
The Handmaid's Tale
Opowieść podręcznej
The Handmaid's Tale
programme.desc: The Handmaid's Tale: Created by Bruce Miller. With Elisabeth Moss, Yvonne Strahovski, Joseph Fiennes, Ann Dowd. Set in a dystopian future, a woman is forced to live as a concubine under a fundamentalist theocratic dictatorship." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt5834204/","name":"The Handmaid's Tale","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZGZiMTkzZjktNzk0OC00NzEzLWJjOTMtYjdkMWM1NGU1ZDM4XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTEyMjM2NDc2._V1_.jpg","description":"Set in a dystopian future, a woman is forced to live as a concubine under a fundamentalist theocratic dictatorship.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt5834204/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"gottawalkit"},"dateCreated":"2017-06-15","inLanguage":"English","name":"You think you have seen horror films?","reviewBody":"If I may start 'off-topic' for a moment. I am male, mid sixties, and have watched, like many others, all the great (and not-so-great) horror films. After watching the ten episodes of 'The Handmaid's Tale' I can safely say that THIS is a real horror story. It makes the entire horror genre seem like cotton candy. After each episode I find myself shaking, often with tears in my eyes. I'm not going to talk about the story. I am going to tell you that the acting is beyond reproach. In almost every movie, every TV series, there are at least one or two characters that don't fit or are poorly portrayed. Not so here. I simply cannot find fault with the performances of the entire cast. Stellar! The sets, the direction, the camera work, the intensity all fit together seamlessly. This is a story of a good world...gone very wrong. This is a story about faith, twisted by evil intent, then thrust upon the common people. For me it is truly horrifying. I'm sorry I can't find better words to describe how this show affects me. I will say this: My daughter is currently attending university in the U.S. and I can tell you I fear for her safety every hour of every day. Not because this story is happening now...but because it is so close.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":10}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":200987,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":8.4},"contentRating":"TV-MA","genre":["Drama","Sci-Fi","Thriller"],"datePublished":"2017-04-26","keywords":"rape,dystopia,violence against women,slavery,torture","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005253/","name":"Elisabeth Moss"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2088803/","name":"Yvonne Strahovski"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001212/","name":"Joseph Fiennes"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0071026/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0108881/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0588005/","name":"Bruce Miller"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Season 4 Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2726412313","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZTljMGNkYTMtMzE3MS00ZjM2LThjY2ItM2Q5YTVhYmI0ZmEzXkEyXkFqcGdeQXZ3ZXNsZXk@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZTljMGNkYTMtMzE3MS00ZjM2LThjY2ItM2Q5YTVhYmI0ZmEzXkEyXkFqcGdeQXZ3ZXNsZXk@._V1_.jpg","description":"Freedom is just the beginning. The Emmy-winning series, The Handmaid's Tale, returns for Season 4 on April 28, 2021, only on Hulu.\n\nThe cultural phenomenon picks up where we left off, with June's fight for freedom against Gilead. But the risks she takes bring unexpected and dangerous new challenges, and her desire for justice and revenge threaten to consume her and destroy her most cherished relationships."}}</script><metacontent="

programme.desc: The White Lotus: Created by Mike White. With Murray Bartlett, Connie Britton, Jennifer Coolidge, Alexandra Daddario. Set in a tropical resort, it follows the exploits of various guests and employees over the span of a week." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt13406094/","name":"The White Lotus","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOWY1YjY1MWUtYWY5Yi00YTM4LTkyM2UtMDQ3NmFiYTkyYjlkXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMDM2NDM2MQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Set in a tropical resort, it follows the exploits of various guests and employees over the span of a week.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt13406094/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"idospasjody"},"dateCreated":"2021-08-11","inLanguage":"English","name":"This is the BEST dark comedy in years","reviewBody":"This is a gem. The writing and acting is amazing. I can't wait for every Sunday evening. I wish I wouldn't have started it so I could binge watch the hole thing. There are parts that it takes a few seconds for your brain to process and then bang OMG laugh out loud funny. Rewind watch again funny. The story telling is masterful. Only thing wrong with this show is can't find anything to it's equal wile waiting for the next one to be released.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":10}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":27138,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.7},"contentRating":"TV-MA","genre":["Comedy","Drama"],"datePublished":"2021-07-11","keywords":"male explicit nudity,resort,full frontal male nudity,social satire,satire","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0058864/","name":"Murray Bartlett"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0110168/","name":"Connie Britton"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0177639/","name":"Jennifer Coolidge"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0193472/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0925234/","name":"Mike White"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1544732697","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYTRkZmMyYmMtNDNiYi00MDYyLTgyYTEtNmVhYjcwZTljZWRjXkEyXkFqcGdeQXZ3ZXNsZXk@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYTRkZmMyYmMtNDNiYi00MDYyLTgyYTEtNmVhYjcwZTljZWRjXkEyXkFqcGdeQXZ3ZXNsZXk@._V1_.jpg","description":"Among the employees at The White Lotus are the fastidious resort manager Armond (Murray Bartlett), who, after a sudden trauma, begins a dramatic downward spiral - and the down-to-earth spa manager, Belinda (Natasha Rothwell) who gets taken on an emotional roller coaster ride by a needy guest. The vacationers include the Mossbacher family - Nicole (Connie Britton), a successful type-A exec, who can't help but treat her family like disobedient employees; her husband, Mark (Steve Zahn), dealing with both an embarrassing health crisis and a terminal inferiority complex; their teenaged son, Quinn (Fred Hechinger), a socially awkward gamer, experiencing the wonder of nature for the very first time; their daughter, Olivia (Sydney Sweeney), and her friend, Paula (Brittany O'Grady), sharp-tongued college sophomores who cast a sardonic eye on the lifestyles and belief systems of everyone around them. The handsome, entitled Shane Patton (Jake Lacy) is here with his beautiful bride, Rachel (Alexandra Daddario). Shane and Rachel are in the throes of young love, but as they get to know each other better in this new, intimate environment, clouds of doubt appear - and by the time Shane's intrusive mother, Kitty (Molly Shannon) surprises them with an unwelcome visit, their fairytale honeymoon has begun to unravel. And finally, there is Tanya McQuoid (Jennifer Coolidge), a wealthy, unstable woman, recovering from the death of her mother, traveling alone to the hotel, looking for love and in desperate need of a massage."}}</script><metacontent="

Devastated by the First World War and plunged into political controversy, Romania's every hope accompanies its queen on her mission to Paris to lobby for international recognition of its great unification at the 1919 peace talks." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt9110902/","name":"Queen Marie of Romania","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYTExMWJhNzEtZWI1OS00YWM4LTk4YTYtODkyNzAzYTEyOTNmXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMjE4NzUxNDA@._V1_.jpg","description":"Devastated by the First World War and plunged into political controversy, Romania's every hope accompanies its queen on her mission to Paris to lobby for international recognition of its great unification at the 1919 peace talks.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt9110902/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"safsurfer"},"dateCreated":"2019-12-31","inLanguage":"English","name":"Slow boring and hard to get into.","reviewBody":"I can't comment on the historical accuracy so this review is just about the film as a period drama. I found it a bit slow for my tastes. The characters were dull and boring. Any actionable drama seemed forced and somewhat out of character for the characters. I'm guessing the writers and producers wanted it that way and maybe it is historically accurate but the pacing and dialog practically put me to sleep. Sorry this was only watchable, a 6 for me.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":6}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":1890,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.4},"genre":["Drama"],"datePublished":"2019-11-08","keywords":"paris peace conference,romania,world war one,treaty of versailles","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi904511513","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMzA5ODQ2OTMtYmEyMi00N2NlLWI4NmMtYjUwODFiMzgyNmY5XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMzA5ODQ2OTMtYmEyMi00N2NlLWI4NmMtYjUwODFiMzgyNmY5XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":""},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm5404849/","name":"Roxana Lupu"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2088951/","name":"Daniel Plier"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0253355/","name":"Richard Elfyn"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0128636/","name":"Alexis Cahill"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0238186/","name":"Brigitte Drodtloff"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0087275/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0030727/","name":"Gabi Antal"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0128636/","name":"Alexis Cahill"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0238186/","name":"Brigitte Drodtloff"}],"duration":"PT1H50M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: The Handmaid's Tale
The Handmaid's Tale
Opowieść podręcznej
The Handmaid's Tale
programme.desc: The Handmaid's Tale: Created by Bruce Miller. With Elisabeth Moss, Yvonne Strahovski, Joseph Fiennes, Ann Dowd. Set in a dystopian future, a woman is forced to live as a concubine under a fundamentalist theocratic dictatorship." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt5834204/","name":"The Handmaid's Tale","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZGZiMTkzZjktNzk0OC00NzEzLWJjOTMtYjdkMWM1NGU1ZDM4XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTEyMjM2NDc2._V1_.jpg","description":"Set in a dystopian future, a woman is forced to live as a concubine under a fundamentalist theocratic dictatorship.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt5834204/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"gottawalkit"},"dateCreated":"2017-06-15","inLanguage":"English","name":"You think you have seen horror films?","reviewBody":"If I may start 'off-topic' for a moment. I am male, mid sixties, and have watched, like many others, all the great (and not-so-great) horror films. After watching the ten episodes of 'The Handmaid's Tale' I can safely say that THIS is a real horror story. It makes the entire horror genre seem like cotton candy. After each episode I find myself shaking, often with tears in my eyes. I'm not going to talk about the story. I am going to tell you that the acting is beyond reproach. In almost every movie, every TV series, there are at least one or two characters that don't fit or are poorly portrayed. Not so here. I simply cannot find fault with the performances of the entire cast. Stellar! The sets, the direction, the camera work, the intensity all fit together seamlessly. This is a story of a good world...gone very wrong. This is a story about faith, twisted by evil intent, then thrust upon the common people. For me it is truly horrifying. I'm sorry I can't find better words to describe how this show affects me. I will say this: My daughter is currently attending university in the U.S. and I can tell you I fear for her safety every hour of every day. programme.review: IMDb data; ttnr: 5834204, Title: The Handmaid's Tale, --- Description: The Handmaid's Tale: Created by Bruce Miller. With Elisabeth Moss, Yvonne Strahovski, Joseph Fiennes, Ann Dowd. Set in a dystopian future, a woman is forced to live as a concubine under a fundamentalist theocratic dictatorship." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt5834204/","name":"The Handmaid's Tale","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZGZiMTkzZjktNzk0OC00NzEzLWJjOTMtYjdkMWM1NGU1ZDM4XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTEyMjM2NDc2._V1_.jpg","description":"Set in a dystopian future, a woman is forced to live as a concubine under a fundamentalist theocratic dictatorship.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt5834204/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"gottawalkit","dateCreated":"2017-06-15","inLanguage":"English","name":"You think you have seen horror films?","reviewBody":"If I may start 'off-topic' for a moment. I am male, mid sixties, and have watched, like many others, all the great (and not-so-great) horror films. After watching the ten episodes of 'The Handmaid's Tale' I can safely say that THIS is a real horror story. It makes the entire horror genre seem like cotton candy. After each episode I find myself shaking, often with tears in my eyes. I'm not going to talk about the story. I am going to tell you that the acting is beyond reproach. In almost every movie, every TV series, there are at least one or two characters that don't fit or are poorly portrayed. Not so here. I simply cannot find fault with the performances of the entire cast. Stellar! The sets, the direction, the camera work, the intensity all fit together seamlessly. This is a story of a good world...gone very wrong. This is a story about faith, twisted by evil intent, then thrust upon the common people. For me it is truly horrifying. I'm sorry I can't find better words to describe how this show affects me. I will say this: My daughter is currently attending university in the U.S. and I can tell you I fear for her safety every hour of every day. Not because this story is happening now...but because it is so close.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":10,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":200987,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":8.4,"contentRating":"TV-MA","genre":["Drama","Sci-Fi","Thriller"],"datePublished":"2017-04-26","keywords":"rape,dystopia,violence against women,slavery,torture","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005253/","name":"Elisabeth Moss","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2088803/","name":"Yvonne Strahovski","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001212/","name":"Joseph Fiennes"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0071026/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0108881/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0588005/","name":"Bruce Miller"],"trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Season 4 Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2726412313","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZTljMGNkYTMtMzE3MS00ZjM2LThjY2ItM2Q5YTVhYmI0ZmEzXkEyXkFqcGdeQXZ3ZXNsZXk@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZTljMGNkYTMtMzE3MS00ZjM2LThjY2ItM2Q5YTVhYmI0ZmEzXkEyXkFqcGdeQXZ3ZXNsZXk@._V1_.jpg","description":"Freedom is just the beginning. The White Lotus
programme.desc: The White Lotus: Created by Mike White. With Murray Bartlett, Connie Britton, Jennifer Coolidge, Alexandra Daddario. Set in a tropical resort, it follows the exploits of various guests and employees over the span of a week." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt13406094/","name":"The White Lotus","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOWY1YjY1MWUtYWY5Yi00YTM4LTkyM2UtMDQ3NmFiYTkyYjlkXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMDM2NDM2MQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Set in a tropical resort, it follows the exploits of various guests and employees over the span of a week.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt13406094/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"idospasjody"},"dateCreated":"2021-08-11","inLanguage":"English","name":"This is the BEST dark comedy in years","reviewBody":"This is a gem. The writing and acting is amazing. I can't wait for every Sunday evening. I wish I wouldn't have started it so I could binge watch the hole thing. There are parts that it takes a few seconds for your brain to process and then bang OMG laugh out loud funny. Rewind watch again funny. The story telling is masterful. Only thing wrong with this show is can't find anything to it's equal wile waiting for the next one to be released.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":10}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":27138,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.7},"contentRating":"TV-MA","genre":["Comedy","Drama"],"datePublished":"2021-07-11","keywords":"male explicit nudity,resort,full frontal male nudity,social satire,satire","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0058864/","name":"Murray Bartlett"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0110168/","name":"Connie Britton"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0177639/","name":"Jennifer Coolidge"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0193472/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0925234/","name":"Mike White"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1544732697","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYTRkZmMyYmMtNDNiYi00MDYyLTgyYTEtNmVhYjcwZTljZWRjXkEyXkFqcGdeQXZ3ZXNsZXk@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYTRkZmMyYmMtNDNiYi00MDYyLTgyYTEtNmVhYjcwZTljZWRjXkEyXkFqcGdeQXZ3ZXNsZXk@._V1_.jpg","description":"Among the employees at The White Lotus are the fastidious resort manager Armond (Murray Bartlett), who, after a sudden trauma, begins a dramatic downward spiral - and the down-to-earth spa manager, Belinda (Natasha Rothwell) who gets taken on an emotional roller coaster ride by a needy guest. The vacationers include the Mossbacher family - Nicole (Connie Britton), a successful type-A exec, who can't help but treat her family like disobedient employees; her husband, Mark (Steve Zahn), dealing with both an embarrassing health crisis and a terminal inferiority complex; their teenaged son, Quinn (Fred Hechinger), a socially awkward gamer, experiencing the wonder of nature for the very first time; their daughter, Olivia (Sydney Sweeney), and her friend, Paula (Brittany O'Grady), sharp-tongued college sophomores who cast a sardonic eye on the lifestyles and belief systems of everyone around them. The handsome, entitled Shane Patton (Jake Lacy) is here with his beautiful bride, Rachel (Alexandra Daddario). Shane and Rachel are in the throes of young love, but as they get to know each other better in this new, intimate environment, clouds of doubt appear - and by the time Shane's intrusive mother, Kitty (Molly Shannon) surprises them with an unwelcome visit, their fairytale honeymoon has begun to unravel. And finally, there is Tanya McQuoid (Jennifer Coolidge), a wealthy, unstable woman, recovering from the death of her mother, traveling alone to the hotel, looking for love and in desperate need of a massage."}}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: You Belong to Me

Every Breath You Take
programme.desc: You Belong to Me: Directed by Vaughn Stein. With Casey Affleck, Michelle Monaghan, Sam Claflin, Veronica Ferres. A psychiatrist, whose client commits suicide, finds his family life disrupted after introducing her surviving brother to his wife and daughter." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt2231874/","name":"You Belong to Me","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMDc0YzQ0YzEtM2YzMC00OGYxLTkxYjEtYmVmZmE1M2RiOWNkXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTAyMjQ3NzQ1._V1_.jpg","description":"A psychiatrist, whose client commits suicide, finds his family life disrupted after introducing her surviving brother to his wife and daughter.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt2231874/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"marplelaura"},"dateCreated":"2021-08-06","inLanguage":"English","name":"It's really not that bad","reviewBody":"Not sure why all the negative reviews. programme.title: Ratatouille
Ratatuj
Ratatouille
programme.desc:
Ratatouille: Directed by Brad Bird, Jan Pinkava. With Patton Oswalt, Ian Holm, Lou Romano, Brian Dennehy. A rat who can cook makes an unusual alliance with a young kitchen worker at a famous restaurant." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0382932/","name":"Ratatouille","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTMzODU0NTkxMF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMjQ4MzMzMw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"A rat who can cook makes an unusual alliance with a young kitchen worker at a famous restaurant.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0382932/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"willden21"},"dateCreated":"2007-06-17","inLanguage":"English","name":"An Amazing film, made for film lovers, with an artistic/indie appeal","reviewBody":"I caught a sneak peak yesterday, and must say, this film is a classic. It is not as flashy as cars, or as action packed as Incredibles, but it is a masterpiece of restraint and heart, that matches the classics from the golden age of the film industry. Pixar has always been groundbreaking for smart and fun animated features, but Ratatouille might just be what puts them over the top as one of the BEST all around film-making teams in history.

Ratatouille is a treat for film lovers. It feels like a classic. The animationis absolutely beautiful, especially the scenery of Paris which evoked awes from the audience, as if we were seeing a grandiose fireworks show.

The story is oh so classy and universal, especially when you look at it as a parable to yourself and society. Sometimes the story seems familiar, yet it is packed with so much genuine heart and individuality, that it might even be too "indie" for most audiences. But those who are patient and willing to open their minds and hearts, even when it may challenge the viewers to rethink their own personal biases, will find within this entertaining, sweet, simple film a remarkable message about challenging societal norms and not letting anything stand in your way of your dreams. When you follow your dreams, you never know what an impact it will have upon you, or those you might encounter on the journey. Just see the film, and be open to its message, and I am sure if you allow it too, it will touch you as well.

P.S. : The short in front of the feature is the funniest animated short film pixar has ever done, so even if ratatouille might not be as flashy as many might want it to be, the short film will have everyone in stitches, as it did our entire theater. So just go and see it, and be prepared for a wonderful two hours.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":10}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":671103,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":8},"contentRating":"G","genre":["Animation","Adventure","Comedy"],"datePublished":"2007-08-22","keywords":"rat,chef,ratatouille,cooking,paris france","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Ratatouille","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi906147865","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNjU0YmUzZTQtZDU4ZS00NWYxLWJlNDMtOWE0ZWIzOGJmODM0XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNjU0YmUzZTQtZDU4ZS00NWYxLWJlNDMtOWE0ZWIzOGJmODM0XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"CT #2, Post"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0004951/","name":"Brad Garrett"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0738918/","name":"Lou Romano"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0652663/","name":"Patton Oswalt"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0083348/","name":"Brad Bird"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0684342/","name":"Jan Pinkava"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0008970/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0017902/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0083348/","name":"Brad Bird"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0684342/","name":"Jan Pinkava"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0135296/","name":"Jim Capobianco"}],"duration":"PT1H51M"}</script><metacontent="

Easy enough, but, unbeknownst to Earl, he's just signed on as a drug courier for a Mexican cartel. He does well - so well, in fact, that his cargo increases exponentially, and Earl is assigned a handler. But he isn't the only one keeping tabs on Earl; the mysterious new drug mule has also hit the radar of hard-charging DEA agent Colin Bates. And even as his money problems become a thing of the past, Earl's past mistakes start to weigh heavily on him, and it's uncertain if he'll have time to right those wrongs before law enforcement, or the cartel's enforcers, catch up to him."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000142/","name":"Clint Eastwood"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm8423767/","name":"Patrick L. programme.title: A Beautiful Day in the Neighborhood
Cóż za piękny dzień
A Beautiful Day in the Neighborhood
programme.desc: A Beautiful Day in the Neighborhood: Directed by Marielle Heller. With Tom Hanks, Matthew Rhys, Chris Cooper, Susan Kelechi Watson. Based on the true story of a real-life friendship between Fred Rogers and journalist Lloyd Vogel." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt3224458/","name":"A Beautiful Day in the Neighborhood","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZWE3ZDYwNmItOWM5ZS00Y2Q4LTlhNmYtODlhY2QxYzA1MDlhXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjA5MDIyMzU@._V1_.jpg","description":"Based on the true story of a real-life friendship between Fred Rogers and journalist Lloyd Vogel.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt3224458/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"gsygsy"},"dateCreated":"2019-10-18","inLanguage":"English","name":"Thoughtful and textured","reviewBody":"This could so easily have been sentimental Hollywood pap about settling family feuds. Instead, it's a thoughtful, textured contemplation of how we can effectively deal with our expectations, disappointments and imperfections. It is true, as others have pointed out, that the female roles are ciphers, which might be considered a surprising weakness in a film directed by a woman. Nonetheless, Marielle Heller, who did such an excellent job on CAN YOU EVER FORGIVE ME? also steers this movie superbly, handling the performances and the screenplay's playful shifts of tone with great assurance.\n\nThe central trio -- Tom Hanks, Matthew Rhys and Chris Cooper -- are reliably terrific.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":69368,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.3},"contentRating":"PG","genre":["Biography","Drama"],"datePublished":"2019-11-22","keywords":"journalist,television host,fred rogers character,based on real person,father son relationship","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"International Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3470638873","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYmI3YWFkNTUtZWYzMC00M2FmLWE2YjgtYTRjNTY2MmFiOGQ2XkEyXkFqcGdeQWFybm8@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYmI3YWFkNTUtZWYzMC00M2FmLWE2YjgtYTRjNTY2MmFiOGQ2XkEyXkFqcGdeQWFybm8@._V1_.jpg","description":"A timely story of kindness triumphing over cynicism, based on the true story of a real-life friendship between Fred Rogers and journalist Tom Junod. After a jaded magazine writer is assigned a profile of Fred Rogers, he overcomes his skepticism, learning about empathy, kindness, and decency from America's most beloved neighbor."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000158/","name":"Tom Hanks"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0722629/","name":"Matthew Rhys"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0177933/","name":"Chris Cooper"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1716636/","name":"Marielle Heller"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0148020/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0562497/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0005883/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2873116/","name":"Micah Fitzerman-Blue"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1406764/","name":"Noah Harpster"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1754526/","name":"Tom Junod"}],"duration":"PT1H49M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: The Lego Batman Movie
LEGO® BATMAN: FILM
The Lego Batman Movie
programme.desc: The Lego Batman Movie: Directed by Chris McKay. With Will Arnett, Michael Cera, Rosario Dawson, Ralph Fiennes. A cooler-than-ever Bruce Wayne must deal with the usual suspects as they plan to rule Gotham City, while discovering that he has accidentally adopted a teenage orphan who wishes to become his sidekick." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt4116284/","name":"The Lego Batman Movie","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTcyNTEyOTY0M15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwOTAyNzU3MDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"A cooler-than-ever Bruce Wayne must deal with the usual suspects as they plan to rule Gotham City, while discovering that he has accidentally adopted a teenage orphan who wishes to become his sidekick.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt4116284/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Thekeybaldemasterrises"},"dateCreated":"2017-02-10","inLanguage":"English","name":"It's not just a great kids movie, it's a great Batman movie!!!","reviewBody":"This is the best theatrical film based on DC property that WB has put out in years. Sorry fans but this blew all 3 of the cinematic universe movies out of the freaking water. Just like the movie before it, the LEGO Batman movie surprises yet again with a fun piece of imaginative work. It has the humor, the action, the animation, and surprisingly again the heart. We thought to ourselves a Lego movie would never work, it sounds like the ultimate marketing sham Hollywood could ever put out to sell toys, but it became one my favorite animated films of all time why? The first movie blew me away because it not only worked as a story, but it encompassed everything a fan of Lego remembers. In a similar fashion, this movie encompassed everything you know about Batman, and I mean everything. I swear there was almost a reference to everything you remember about him, from Detective Comics all the way to Batfleck. It sounds like I'm talking about fan service because yes, it is most of the time. They use it to their advantage here, they praise and mock everything great, and everything terrible Batman has gone through over the years. You almost miss too much because they cram so many funny nod ons and jokes you wish they had spread em out a little bit. But In other words, the script is a hilarious tribute to arguably one of the greatest superheroes of all time, and surprisingly the most emotional. The focus of the film actually deals with to me a critical factor of Batman. His isolation and loneliness, his fear of becoming part of a family again. The special relationship Batman has with the Joker. It hits all the emotional beats just right with all of its themes. It utilizes it's imagination of Legos to it's potential. And it produces a fantastic message for kids, as well as a touching tribute to fans of Batman. Seriously this movie had a smile on my face except for the parts when it really hit home for me. It also makes me mad, because the film proves that WB is just sitting on a character's pile of good material to work with, and they don't know what to do with them in their real films. This movie has such a stronger emotional impact than anything the DC cinematic universe has done with its last three films. It doesn't mean DC has to sell to Disney, it doesn't mean critics are biased against DC. It just means when you get people who know the material well, they're gonna make it a great film if they know what to do with it. That's what's happening here, if WB can take notes and study why this movie really works, maybe the Justice League and Ben Affleck's Batman film will actually make a better impact? Regardless, this is the standard animated movies need to have outside of Disney, and WB really needs to bring the heart this movie has into their live action films. If you love Legos and Batman what are you waiting for?? Go now!! You don't even have to take a kid, it's a total blast for all ages, and I will definitely be seeing it again real soon.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":9}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":137674,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.3},"contentRating":"PG","genre":["Animation","Action","Adventure"],"datePublished":"2017-02-09","keywords":"lego,batmobile,dc comics,based on comic book,batman character","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Extended TV Spot","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi466269721","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTY0NTAyMDA5NV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwODM2NzM4MDI@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTY0NTAyMDA5NV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwODM2NzM4MDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"There are big changes brewing in Gotham, and if Batman wants to save the city from the Joker's hostile takeover, he may have to drop the lone vigilante thing, try to work with others, and maybe learn to lighten up."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0004715/","name":"Will Arnett"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0148418/","name":"Michael Cera"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0206257/","name":"Rosario Dawson"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0003021/","name":"Chris McKay"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0005154/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0283444/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0602537/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0334381/","name":"Seth Grahame-Smith"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0571344/","name":"Chris McKenna"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1273099/","name":"Erik Sommers"}],"duration":"PT1H44M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Przegląd tygodnia: Wieczór z Johnem Oliverem 8
programme.desc: John Oliver, jedna z najbarwniejszych postaci amerykańskiej telewizji, zaprasza na ósmy sezon show, w którym prezentuje swój punkt widzenia i komentuje wydarzenia minionego tygodnia. Porusza polityczne kwestie, które angażują uwagę wszystkich mieszkańców USA, stosuje cięte riposty i z angielskim dystansem rozbawia widzów.

programme.title: The L Word: Generation Q
The L Word: Generation Q
Słowo na L: Generacja Q
The L Word: Generation Q
programme.desc: The L Word: Generation Q: Created by Michele Abbott, Ilene Chaiken, Kathy Greenberg, Marja-Lewis Ryan. With Jennifer Beals, Katherine Moennig, Leisha Hailey, Arienne Mandi. Bette Porter, Shane McCutcheon, and Alice Pieszecki intermingle with a younger generation of Los Angelenos experiencing love, heartbreak, sex, setbacks, and success." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt7661384/","name":"The L Word: Generation Q","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNWY2ZTE4NzAtMzgyOC00NmY4LTlhZDktZGRhYTNlNzFlODliXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyOTA3MTMyOTk@._V1_.jpg","description":"Bette Porter, Shane McCutcheon, and Alice Pieszecki intermingle with a younger generation of Los Angelenos experiencing love, heartbreak, sex, setbacks, and success.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt7661384/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"umwotulookin"},"dateCreated":"2021-08-18","inLanguage":"English","name":"L is for lost","reviewBody":"I'm biased in writing this since I'm comparing the original but one can't help do that when some of the same cast members are in this one. What I loved about the first one was it's rawness, it's artiness, it's intellect. No one, besides Bette maybe, was established and you're watching this group of gay friends find their way in life with all the drama in tow. Some storylines were risqué for the time, which made it all the more interesting. Cut to now and all of our beloved characters are well established, living these high flying lives that just seems so untrue to the characters that they were and it takes away a certain quality and relatability from them. We're now expected to find this in these new characters but the writing just doesn't quite live up to that same quirky standard. I understand this is a different show and perhaps they had to sell it that way to bring it back, perhaps they felt they needed a younger generation for a younger audience to relate to. It's not a bad show and the new characters aren't terrible, but there's a certain depth missing here. There was more to the L Word than affairs, it was about power dynamics, whilst at the same time being goofy and at times off the wall. GQ seems lost in a soap opera style drama and that comedic aspect seems absent. Which for an audience still deprived of real representation in the mainstream, might not seem that bad, but for others expecting more than this, you'll likely be disappointed.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":5}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":4263,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.3},"contentRating":"TV-MA","genre":["Drama"],"datePublished":"2019-12-08","keywords":"lesbian","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000884/","name":"Jennifer Beals"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0595485/","name":"Katherine Moennig"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0354157/","name":"Leisha Hailey"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0052980/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1271093/","name":"Michele Abbott"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0149669/","name":"Ilene Chaiken"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1271884/","name":"Kathy Greenberg"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Season 2 Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3625959449","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYmYzNGQzZjQtZGYxOS00OTRiLTg2ZDEtYzhhMmQzYzU5NjMzXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYmYzNGQzZjQtZGYxOS00OTRiLTg2ZDEtYzhhMmQzYzU5NjMzXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Season 2 is available to stream August 6, 2021 on SHOWTIME."}}</script><metacontent="

IMDb data; ttnr: 7661384, Title: The L Word: Generation Q, --- Description: The L Word: Generation Q: Created by Michele Abbott, Ilene Chaiken, Kathy Greenberg, Marja-Lewis Ryan. With Jennifer Beals, Katherine Moennig, Leisha Hailey, Arienne Mandi. Bette Porter, Shane McCutcheon, and Alice Pieszecki intermingle with a younger generation of Los Angelenos experiencing love, heartbreak, sex, setbacks, and success." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt7661384/","name":"The L Word: Generation Q","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNWY2ZTE4NzAtMzgyOC00NmY4LTlhZDktZGRhYTNlNzFlODliXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyOTA3MTMyOTk@._V1_.jpg","description":"Bette Porter, Shane McCutcheon, and Alice Pieszecki intermingle with a younger generation of Los Angelenos experiencing love, heartbreak, sex, setbacks, and success.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt7661384/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"umwotulookin","dateCreated":"2021-08-18","inLanguage":"English","name":"L is for lost","reviewBody":"I'm biased in writing this since I'm comparing the original but one can't help do that when some of the same cast members are in this one. What I loved about the first one was it's rawness, it's artiness, it's intellect. No one, besides Bette maybe, was established and you're watching this group of gay friends find their way in life with all the drama in tow. Some storylines were risqué for the time, which made it all the more interesting. Cut to now and all of our beloved characters are well established, living these high flying lives that just seems so untrue to the characters that they were and it takes away a certain quality and relatability from them. We're now expected to find this in these new characters but the writing just doesn't quite live up to that same quirky standard. I understand this is a different show and perhaps they had to sell it that way to bring it back, perhaps they felt they needed a younger generation for a younger audience to relate to. It's not a bad show and the new characters aren't terrible, but there's a certain depth missing here. There was more to the L Word than affairs, it was about power dynamics, whilst at the same time being goofy and at times off the wall. GQ seems lost in a soap opera style drama and that comedic aspect seems absent. Which for an audience still deprived of real representation in the mainstream, might not seem that bad, but for others expecting more than this, you'll likely be disappointed.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":5,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":4263,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.3,"contentRating":"TV-MA","genre":["Drama"],"datePublished":"2019-12-08","keywords":"lesbian","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000884/","name":"Jennifer Beals","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0595485/","name":"Katherine Moennig","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0354157/","name":"Leisha Hailey"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0052980/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1271093/","name":"Michele Abbott","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0149669/","name":"Ilene Chaiken","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1271884/","name":"Kathy Greenberg"],"trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Season 2 Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3625959449","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYmYzNGQzZjQtZGYxOS00OTRiLTg2ZDEtYzhhMmQzYzU5NjMzXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYmYzNGQzZjQtZGYxOS00OTRiLTg2ZDEtYzhhMmQzYzU5NjMzXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Season 2 is available to stream August 6, 2021 on SHOWTIME."</script><metacontent="

programme.title: WALL·E
WALL·E
programme.desc:
WALL·E: Directed by Andrew Stanton. With Ben Burtt, Elissa Knight, Jeff Garlin, Fred Willard. In the distant future, a small waste-collecting robot inadvertently embarks on a space journey that will ultimately decide the fate of mankind." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0910970/","name":"WALL·E","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjExMTg5OTU0NF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMjMxMzMzMw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"In the distant future, a small waste-collecting robot inadvertently embarks on a space journey that will ultimately decide the fate of mankind.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0910970/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"KissEnglishPasto"},"dateCreated":"2016-08-02","inLanguage":"English","name":"Pixar Hit a Home Run with Wall-E, They Just Didn't Hit It Out of the Park!","reviewBody":"From PASTO, COLOMBIA-Via: L. A. CA; CALI, COLOMBIA+ORLANDO, FL The ONLY Tony Kiss Castillo on FaceBook! ....................................

Shame on me for ignoring my own rule of thumb and slurping up so many of the gushing reviews for Wall-E. My expectation was somewhere around Pluto, but this only managed to take me to Saturn. Normally, Saturn would warrant a rave review, but not when a film falls somewhat short of that ever-so-high bar you've set for it! Don't get me wrong. Pixar has hit a home run with Wall-E. They just did not hit one out of the park, as so many others would have you believe.

The movie really does work on just about every imaginable level. The Pixar animation team most certainly outdid themselves, taking CGI to an impressive and breathtakingly realistic new level for 2008. Wall-E is, at times thought-provoking, ironic, laugh-out-loud funny, poignant, entertaining, and perhaps, somewhat romantic. Yes, all of this with a highly original story line and offbeat musical accompaniment. Those elements which are borrowed from other movies are at least incorporated with a fresh twist.

Wall-E most definitely has its shortcomings: A little over the top at times in the "Gee, aren't we just the cutest on screen Bots you've ever seen?" Department. There are also a couple occasions where the substitution of dialog for assorted sound effects becomes a bit tedious.

Fortunately, the movie is very low key as regards the results of long term ravaging of the environment, not at all in-your-face as so often is the case with movies made in the recent years. Taken as a whole, though, Wall-E deserves between 8 and 8 1/2*. In any case, please, simply put aside the reviews and just watch Wall-E, hopefully, leaving your expectations behind. You'll probably have a very enjoyable and entertaining 90 minutes.

8* STARS*...ENJOY/DISFRUTELA!

Any comments, questions or observations, in English or Español, are most welcome!","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":1041476,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":8.4},"contentRating":"G","genre":["Animation","Adventure","Family"],"datePublished":"2008-08-06","keywords":"robot,obesity,recycling robot,adrift in space,cgi animation","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Wall E","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2192703769","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTc2Njc2MTYyN15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMzcwNTczMzE@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTc2Njc2MTYyN15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMzcwNTczMzE@._V1_.jpg","description":"Wall E - Trailer #3"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0123785/","name":"Ben Burtt"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2264184/","name":"Elissa Knight"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0307531/","name":"Jeff Garlin"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0004056/","name":"Andrew Stanton"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0622634/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0017902/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0008970/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0004056/","name":"Andrew Stanton"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0230032/","name":"Pete Docter"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0714114/","name":"Jim Reardon"}],"duration":"PT1H38M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Pulp Fiction
Pulp Fiction
programme.desc: Pulp Fiction: Directed by Quentin Tarantino. With Tim Roth, Amanda Plummer, Laura Lovelace, John Travolta. The lives of two mob hitmen, a boxer, a gangster and his wife, and a pair of diner bandits intertwine in four tales of violence and redemption." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0110912/","name":"Pulp Fiction","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNGNhMDIzZTUtNTBlZi00MTRlLWFjM2ItYzViMjE3YzI5MjljXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzkwMjQ5NzM@._V1_.jpg","description":"The lives of two mob hitmen, a boxer, a gangster and his wife, and a pair of diner bandits intertwine in four tales of violence and redemption.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0110912/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"wolvesrug"},"dateCreated":"2005-01-09","inLanguage":"English","name":"Simply The Best","reviewBody":"To put this in context, I am 34 years old and I have to say that this is the best film I have seen without doubt and I don't expect it will be beaten as far as I am concerned. Obviously times move on, and I acknowledge that due to its violence and one particularly uncomfortable scene this film is not for everyone, but I still remember watching it for the first time, and it blew me away. Anyone who watches it now has to remember that it actually changed the history of cinema. In context- it followed a decade or more of action films that always ended with a chase sequence where the hero saved the day - you could have written those films yourself. Pulp had you gripped and credited the audience with intelligence. There is not a line of wasted dialogue and the movie incorporates a number of complexities that are not immediately obvious. It also resurrected the career of Grease icon John Travolta and highlighted the acting talent of Samuel L Jackson. IMDb data; ttnr: 0110912, Title: Pulp Fiction, --- Description: Pulp Fiction: Directed by Quentin Tarantino. With Tim Roth, Amanda Plummer, Laura Lovelace, John Travolta. The lives of two mob hitmen, a boxer, a gangster and his wife, and a pair of diner bandits intertwine in four tales of violence and redemption." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0110912/","name":"Pulp Fiction","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNGNhMDIzZTUtNTBlZi00MTRlLWFjM2ItYzViMjE3YzI5MjljXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzkwMjQ5NzM@._V1_.jpg","description":"The lives of two mob hitmen, a boxer, a gangster and his wife, and a pair of diner bandits intertwine in four tales of violence and redemption.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0110912/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"wolvesrug","dateCreated":"2005-01-09","inLanguage":"English","name":"Simply The Best","reviewBody":"To put this in context, I am 34 years old and I have to say that this is the best film I have seen without doubt and I don't expect it will be beaten as far as I am concerned. Obviously times move on, and I acknowledge that due to its violence and one particularly uncomfortable scene this film is not for everyone, but I still remember watching it for the first time, and it blew me away. Anyone who watches it now has to remember that it actually changed the history of cinema. In context- it followed a decade or more of action films that always ended with a chase sequence where the hero saved the day - you could have written those films yourself. Pulp had you gripped and credited the audience with intelligence. There is not a line of wasted dialogue and the movie incorporates a number of complexities that are not immediately obvious. It also resurrected the career of Grease icon John Travolta and highlighted the acting talent of Samuel L Jackson. There are many films now that are edited out of sequence and have multiple plots etc but this is the one they all want to be, or all want to beat, but never will.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":10,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":1905493,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":8.9,"contentRating":"R","genre":["Crime","Drama"],"datePublished":"1994-10-14","keywords":"nonlinear timeline,overdose,drug overdose,drug use,bondage","trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2620371481","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjI5MzgxMTQ4M15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNjczMTk0NzE@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjI5MzgxMTQ4M15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNjczMTk0NzE@._V1_.jpg","description":"The lives of two mob hit men, a boxer, a gangster's wife, and a pair of diner bandits intertwine in four tales of violence and redemption.","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000237/","name":"John Travolta","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000235/","name":"Uma Thurman","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000168/","name":"Samuel L. Turtle Power: The Definitive History of the Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles
programme.desc: Turtle Power: The Definitive History of the Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles: Directed by Randall Lobb. With Peter Laird, Kevin Eastman, Mark Askwith, Richard Rosenbaum. The history of the Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtle franchise." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt3817848/","name":"Turtle Power: The Definitive History of the Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTU1OTAxODYwOV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwODM0ODY0MjE@._V1_.jpg","description":"The history of the Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtle franchise.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt3817848/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Fluke_Skywalker"},"dateCreated":"2015-06-21","inLanguage":"English","name":"Cowabunga!","reviewBody":"By "definitive" they mean through 1990 or so, but that's okay, as that really covers that first initial wave of Turtlemania that swept the globe. With a runtime of just over 90 minutes, this is never the less a very thorough documentary about how an independently made black and white comic with a strange title and an even stranger premise came to dominate popular culture in the late 80s and early 90s. It features nearly all the people who were there and played a vital role, from creators Eastman and Laird to the makers and voice talent from the cartoon to the director and stars of the first live action movie to the people at Playmates toys who helped the Turtles become one of the biggest toy lines of all time. This is a well and lovingly made documentary and a must-see for any Turtles fan.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":941,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.1},"contentRating":"PG","genre":["Documentary"],"datePublished":"2014-08-12","keywords":"ninja,mutant,turtle,comic book,mirage comics","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"TURTLE POWER: The Definitive History of The Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3001330713","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNDc1ODQ4NjczNF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNDgxNjIzMzE@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNDc1ODQ4NjczNF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNDgxNjIzMzE@._V1_.jpg","description":"Go behind-the-scenes and beneath the streets to discover the real origin story of four of pop cultureÂ’s most enduring heroes in the captivating new film TURTLE POWER: The Definitive History of the Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles, which is debuting on DVD, VOD and Digital HD. Written and directed by Randall Lobb, the film chronicles the birth of a franchise and reveals the remarkable journey of four of the most unlikely super heroes of all time. Celebrate the 30th anniversary of Leonardo, Donatello, Michelangelo and Raphael with this must-see documentary."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0481990/","name":"Peter Laird"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0247653/","name":"Kevin Eastman"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0039497/","name":"Mark Askwith"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm4902126/","name":"Randall Lobb"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0715943/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0487491/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0487492/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm4902126/","name":"Randall Lobb"}],"duration":"PT1H38M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Daddy's Home
Tata kontra tata
Daddy's Home
programme.desc:
Daddy's Home: Directed by Sean Anders. With Will Ferrell, Mark Wahlberg, Linda Cardellini, Thomas Haden Church. Brad Whitaker is a radio host trying to get his stepchildren to love him and call him Dad. But his plans turn upside down when their biological father, Dusty Mayron, returns." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1528854/","name":"Daddy's Home","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTQ0OTE1MTk4N15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMDM5OTk5NjE@._V1_.jpg","description":"Brad Whitaker is a radio host trying to get his stepchildren to love him and call him Dad. But his plans turn upside down when their biological father, Dusty Mayron, returns.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1528854/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Reno-Rangan"},"dateCreated":"2016-03-24","inLanguage":"English","name":"Step-dad versus stepped-in dad.","reviewBody":"In the past for an action movie, Will Ferrell and Mark Wahlberg came together and now for a comedy, once again the unusual combo returned. Surprisingly the movie was more hilarious than what I thought after listening to those who saw it already. Being a comedian, Will Ferrell was as usual awesome, but Wahlberg contribution had an equally advantageous.

The story was a one liner, but individual comedy scenes made an impact for its grand scale success. Generally, the scenes from the comedy films are easy to predict, so in this I felt similarly, but in the many parts it kept turning in another direction. Tried its best to avoid clichés, but we know that's impossible. Either way, it carried out some decent laughs.

The movie was all about the dad versus the step-dad. When a man thinks he's finally getting along with his step-kids, then comes their real dad who threatens to take aback his wife and children. So they go head-to-head and followed by a chain of life changing events comes a suitable conclusion. But there's a loop in the end, so possibly we can expect a sequel. Knowing it was not the best comedy of the year, I was not upset either for overall movie. I can even suggest it if you are looking for a simple entertainment.

7/10","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":113498,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.2},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Comedy","Family"],"datePublished":"2015-12-30","keywords":"sweat,pull,pull ups,push,muscle","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Trailer #2","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1706799641","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNzM0NjMzMzAzOF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMTQwMjExNzE@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNzM0NjMzMzAzOF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMTQwMjExNzE@._V1_.jpg","description":"A mild-mannered radio executive strives to become the best stepdad to his wife's two children, but complications ensue when their freewheeling and freeloading real father arrives, forcing him to compete for the affection of the kids."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0002071/","name":"Will Ferrell"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000242/","name":"Mark Wahlberg"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0004802/","name":"Linda Cardellini"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1890845/","name":"Sean Anders"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0023400/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0325207/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0186190/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0122602/","name":"Brian Burns"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1890845/","name":"Sean Anders"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1898234/","name":"John Morris"}],"duration":"PT1H36M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: The Spiderwick Chronicles
Kroniki Spiderwick
The Spiderwick Chronicles
programme.desc:
The Spiderwick Chronicles: Directed by Mark Waters. With Freddie Highmore, Mary-Louise Parker, Nick Nolte, Sarah Bolger. Upon moving into the run-down Spiderwick Estate with their mother, twin brothers Jared and Simon Grace, along with their sister Mallory, find themselves pulled into an alternate world full of faeries and other creatures." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0416236/","name":"The Spiderwick Chronicles","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTMzMDcyMzM2Ml5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTYwNzg1Nzc4._V1_.jpg","description":"Upon moving into the run-down Spiderwick Estate with their mother, twin brothers Jared and Simon Grace, along with their sister Mallory, find themselves pulled into an alternate world full of faeries and other creatures.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0416236/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"moviewizguy"},"dateCreated":"2008-02-15","inLanguage":"English","name":"Their World Is Closer Than You Think","reviewBody":"Upon moving into the run-down Spiderwick Estate with their mother, twin brothers Jared and Simon Grace, along with their sister Mallory, find themselves pulled into an alternate world full of faeries and other creatures.

I've made up a theory: People who have read books that are turned into movies will be more harsh to judge the films unlike people who see movies without reading the book. I think this theory is right. I was disappointed by Harry Potter 5 at first, but watching it now for a year later and nearly forgetting about the book, I found it the best in the series.

The same might as well go with this film. I was disappointed. If you don't know, this film is based on 5 books. However, the movie ignores the 4th book, which is probably because of budget issues and/or limited running time. Still, I can't help but complain. There could've been more creative production designs to see, more action, and more magical creatures.

Apart from that, I felt that the film was well put together, especially the fact that they skipped a lot in the books. The special effects are very good, as well as the action scenes. I also may feel this film pushed the PG rating. It certainly is not as intense as Harry Potter 3 but there might be about 2 to 3 scenes that could make this film a PG-13 rating.

The performances here are decent, although not captivating. The film may be a bit fast paced, if you asked me. Overall, this is a decent adaption to another fantasy book. If you have read the books, you might be disappointed. IMDb data; ttnr: 0416236, Title: The Spiderwick Chronicles, --- Description: The Spiderwick Chronicles: Directed by Mark Waters. With Freddie Highmore, Mary-Louise Parker, Nick Nolte, Sarah Bolger. Upon moving into the run-down Spiderwick Estate with their mother, twin brothers Jared and Simon Grace, along with their sister Mallory, find themselves pulled into an alternate world full of faeries and other creatures." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0416236/","name":"The Spiderwick Chronicles","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTMzMDcyMzM2Ml5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTYwNzg1Nzc4._V1_.jpg","description":"Upon moving into the run-down Spiderwick Estate with their mother, twin brothers Jared and Simon Grace, along with their sister Mallory, find themselves pulled into an alternate world full of faeries and other creatures.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0416236/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"moviewizguy","dateCreated":"2008-02-15","inLanguage":"English","name":"Their World Is Closer Than You Think","reviewBody":"Upon moving into the run-down Spiderwick Estate with their mother, twin brothers Jared and Simon Grace, along with their sister Mallory, find themselves pulled into an alternate world full of faeries and other creatures.

I've made up a theory: People who have read books that are turned into movies will be more harsh to judge the films unlike people who see movies without reading the book. I think this theory is right. I was disappointed by Harry Potter 5 at first, but watching it now for a year later and nearly forgetting about the book, I found it the best in the series.

The same might as well go with this film. I was disappointed. If you don't know, this film is based on 5 books. However, the movie ignores the 4th book, which is probably because of budget issues and/or limited running time. Still, I can't help but complain. There could've been more creative production designs to see, more action, and more magical creatures.

Apart from that, I felt that the film was well put together, especially the fact that they skipped a lot in the books. The special effects are very good, as well as the action scenes. I also may feel this film pushed the PG rating. It certainly is not as intense as Harry Potter 3 but there might be about 2 to 3 scenes that could make this film a PG-13 rating.

The performances here are decent, although not captivating. The film may be a bit fast paced, if you asked me. Overall, this is a decent adaption to another fantasy book. If you have read the books, you might be disappointed. If you have not, enjoy it.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":92060,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.5,"contentRating":"PG","genre":["Action","Adventure","Drama"],"datePublished":"2008-03-26","keywords":"gryphon,competition,boy,dancing,father figure","trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"The Spiderwick Chronicles","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi498204953","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjAyNTY3NTExMl5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNzExNDczMzE@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjAyNTY3NTExMl5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNzExNDczMzE@._V1_.jpg","description":"The Spiderwick Chronicles Trailer","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0383603/","name":"Freddie Highmore","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0092961/","name":"Sarah Bolger","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000657/","name":"David Strathairn"],"director":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0914132/","name":"Mark Waters"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0023400/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0004265/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0013175/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0456732/","name":"Karey Kirkpatrick","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1183854/","name":"David Berenbaum","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000626/","name":"John Sayles"],"duration":"PT1H36M"</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Monsters vs. Aliens
Potwory kontra Obcy
Monsters vs. Aliens
programme.desc:
Monsters vs. Aliens: Directed by Rob Letterman, Conrad Vernon. With Reese Witherspoon, Seth Rogen, Hugh Laurie, Will Arnett. A woman transformed into a giant after she is struck by a meteorite on her wedding day becomes part of a team of monsters sent in by the U.S. government to defeat an alien mastermind trying to take over Earth." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0892782/","name":"Monsters vs. Aliens","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTY0OTQ3MzE3MV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMDQyMzMzMg@@._V1_.jpg","description":"A woman transformed into a giant after she is struck by a meteorite on her wedding day becomes part of a team of monsters sent in by the U.S. government to defeat an alien mastermind trying to take over Earth.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0892782/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Vic_max"},"dateCreated":"2009-03-30","inLanguage":"English","name":"Wonderful summertime treat (even though it's still spring) ...","reviewBody":"If you're going to see this movie, make sure it's the 3D version - not all showings are in 3D. If you have the opportunity to see it in IMAX - it's definitely a 'bigger' treat ... but FWIW, know this: it was "converted" to IMAX from normal print - not created in the IMAX format.

OK - that said, the movie IS worth seeing. I'd say it was somewhere between "really good" and great. It's a fun story with fast pacing, entertaining characters and nice 3D effects.

It's basically about a group of 5 likable "monsters" that are pitted up against an alien attack. The main character is a new "monster" - Ginormica. She's a young lady that was recently hit by a meteorite with a special composition ... one that made her grow to gigantic size.

It's a fun story told in an imaginative way. The visuals are very nicely done - the backgrounds, characters and scope of detail are great. The movie also moves along at brisk pace - something that grabs your attention is always happening (this makes it work well for kids in the audience). Add to that the fun and oddball personalities of the monster characters and you have a winning combination.

The 3D effects were good, although like most other mainstream animated movies - they start out strong and then get recessed into background. Still - make sure you see it in 3D! You'll be missing part of the key experience offered by the movie if you don't.

All in all, this is a fun movie for adults as well as kids. It's kind of a summer movie that you get to watch in the spring. Grab some popcorn and check out this flick!"},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":153371,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.4},"contentRating":"PG","genre":["Animation","Adventure","Comedy"],"datePublished":"2009-04-01","keywords":"giant,alien,giantess,alien invasion,enlargement","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Monsters vs. Aliens -- Superbowl Spot","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2117665561","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjQwMzY5OTc5OV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNjQzNTczMzE@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjQwMzY5OTc5OV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNjQzNTczMzE@._V1_.jpg","description":"This is the Monsters vs. Aliens commercial which aired during the 2009 Superbowl."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000702/","name":"Reese Witherspoon"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0933988/","name":"Rainn Wilson"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0170306/","name":"Stephen Colbert"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1224299/","name":"Rob Letterman"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0970447/","name":"Conrad Vernon"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0129164/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0285379/","name":"Maya Forbes"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0938645/","name":"Wallace Wolodarsky"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1224299/","name":"Rob Letterman"}],"duration":"PT1H34M"}</script><metacontent="
